front.title: Network File System (NFS) Upper Layer Binding To RPC-Over-RDMA

abstract.t: This document specifies Upper Layer Bindings of Network File System (NFS) protocol versions to RPC-over-RDMA. Upper Layer Bindings are required to enable RPC-based protocols, such as NFS, to use Direct Data Placement on RPC-over-RDMA. This document obsoletes RFC 5667.
